body_html:
As noted here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/model_pruning#removing-pruning-ops-from-the-trained-graph-
The model_pruning library helps with the training of a sparse model. It is left upto the underlying hardware platform and inference engine to implement sparse ops to provide acceleration

body:
As noted here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/model_pruning#removing-pruning-ops-from-the-trained-graph-
The model_pruning library helps with the training of a sparse model. It is left upto the underlying hardware platform and inference engine to implement sparse ops to provide acceleration
